readable.content: A bullfighter skewers his prey just as he 's hit by the bull . A fancy outfitted bullfighter and bull . A man stabs a bull in a bullfight . a matador in white and gold clothing and pink sock is getting hit by a raging bull The matador is struck by a charging bull as he stabs it with his swords .
